can you repeat please Flannel ?: right click, go to properties, set it as executable, or use chmod from a terminal (chmod +x file)

alright, open up a terminal, navigate to the folder it's in.  then do this: chmod a+x AutoScan-Network-Linux-1.40.bin (you can use tab complete for the name) and then type this: ./AutoScan-Network-Linux-1.40.bin (you can use tab complete again)
